==Other Interactable Objects==
===Medical History of Giyath Khayyam===
Located behind the Bimarstan building and disappears after interacting with it.
{{Dialogue Start}}
:'''Medical History of [[Khayyam|Giyath Khayyam]]:''' "...Patient age: 65. Gender: Male..."
:'''Medical History of Giyath Khayyam:''' "Symptom: Short-term dysmnesia. Gets worse over time. Emotionally unstable, kept talking about adolescence and childhood memories..."
:'''Medical History of Giyath Khayyam:''' "...Brain disease of unknown cause. Brain exams show the patient's brain cells have been suffering inactivation from the age of 60, leading to gradual loss of memory faculties..."
:'''Medical History of Giyath Khayyam:''' "...Applied for retirement from {{Rubi|Amurta|Biology}} in Akademiya, in the hope that a stable and comfortable life and psychological environment could slow down the deterioration of the patient's condition..."
:'''Medical History of Giyath Khayyam:''' "Amurta announced that the sage [[Siman Farrokhzad]] would ensure the patient's treatment is underway..."
{{Dialogue End}}

==Trivia==
===Etymology===
*"Bimarstan" is a variation of {{Lang|''{{w|bimaristan}}''|ar=بِيْمَارِسْتَان|ar_rm=bīmāristān|fa=بيمارستان|fa_rm=bīmārestān|fa_lit=location of sickness}}, a term for hospitals in the historic Islamic world.
